text: "Cap" is a song by British YouTuber and rapper KSI, featuring American rapper Offset. The song is taken from KSI's debut studio album Dissimulation, which was released on 22 May 2020. The song charted at number 24 on the UK Singles Chart. == Promotion and release == The song's title and featured artist were revealed on 1 May 2020 when the track listing for KSI's upcoming debut studio album Dissimulation was released. "Cap" was released for digital download and streaming upon the release of Dissimulation on 22 May 2020 through American independent record label RBC Records, under BMG Rights Management. KSI explained the song's lyrics and meaning as part of a Genius Verified video interview, which was released on 26 June 2020. == Commercial performance == "Cap" sold 17,496 units in the UK in its first week, debuting at number 24 on the UK Singles Chart, making it KSI's fifth UK top 40 single and Offset's second. The song debuted at number 14 on the UK Hip Hop and R&B; Singles Chart. == Music video == A trailer for the song's music video was released on 18 May 2020. The music video, directed by TajvsTaj, was filmed in Los Angeles in March 2020 and was uploaded to KSI's YouTube channel on 22 May 2020. It has 10 million views. The video stars both artists and is shot in black and white and is filmed in "a warehouse filled with candles". == Credits and personnel == Credits adapted from Tidal. *KSI – vocals, songwriting *Offset – vocals, songwriting *Diego Ave – production, songwriting *Go Grizzly – production, songwriting *Mally Mall – production, songwriting *Ivory Scott – songwriting *Henkka Niemistö – mastering *Michalis Michael – mixing == Charts == {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |+Chart performance for "Cap" ! scope="col"| Chart (2020) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- ! scope="row"| Lithuania (AGATA) | 98 |- ! scope="row"| New Zealand Hot Singles (RMNZ) | 5 |- |- |- |- |} == Release history == {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |+ Release dates and formats for "Cap" ! scope="col"| Region ! scope="col"| Date ! scope="col"| Format(s) ! scope="col"| Label(s) ! scope="col"| |- ! scope="row" | Various | 22 May 2020 | | | |} == References == == External links == * Lyrics of the song at Genius Category:2020 singles Category:2020 songs Category:BMG Rights Management singles Category:KSI (entertainer) songs Category:Offset (rapper) songs Category:RBC Records singles Category:Songs written by KSI (entertainer) Category:Songs written by Offset (rapper)
